title: The Rain in Espa√±a
overview: This is the story of two ambitious students, Luna on architecture at the University of Santo Tomas and Calix on Legal management at the University of Ateneo de Manila. They fall deeply in love with each other, despite the workload of studies, the pressure of families and plans for the future. This young love eventually leads to broken hearts and disappointments that remain with them further in life. But 10 years later they meet again for work, as young professionals.
